name: Wander (itch) (nhadaway)
description:
Wander is about sitting back and interacting with a game in a low-stress, low-speed, calm environment. 

With a theme of "Journey", the point is not to test your reaction times or your gameplay skills, the point is simple: help a bird find some fruit.

Experience a variety of environments and scenes as you hop along.

Credit for code goes to the University of Texas at Austin

Asset Credits:

UNITY TECHNOLOGIES- Water FX Pack
